title: Elven Armaments
game_text: To play, bearer must not be bearing any possessions. Bearer must be an [Elven] companion. Bearer cannot bear any other possessions. While a unique companion bears this possession, the Free Peoples player may not use archery special abilities and the minion archery total is -1.
notes: The card type for this card is both Hand Weapon and Shield. Game text is an erratum.
